layers-desc: Non-destructive image annotation extension for MediaWiki
layers-permission-denied: You do not have permission to edit layers
layers-not-file-page: Layers can only be edited on file pages
layers-panel-subtitle: Drag to reorder • Click name to rename
layers-empty: No layers yet. Choose a tool to begin.
layers-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this layer?
layers-color-picker-empty-slot: Empty slot - colors will be saved here automatically
layers-code-enable: Enable layers to see the code.
layers-load-revision-unsaved-confirm: You have unsaved changes. Load the selected revision anyway?
layers-import-unsaved-confirm: You have unsaved changes. Import anyway?
layers-data-too-large: Layer data exceeds maximum size limit of $1 bytes
layers-unsaved-cancel-confirm: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to cancel?
layers-no-layers: No layers found for this image
layers-rate-limited: You're doing that too much right now. Please try again later.
layers-too-many-layers: Too many layers in one image
layers-too-complex: Layer set is too complex to process
layers-image-too-large: Image is too large to edit with layers
layers-layerset-not-found: Requested layer set was not found
layers-security-violation: Security violation detected in layer data
layers-invalid-coordinates: Invalid coordinates detected in layer data
layers-json-parse-error: Failed to parse JSON layer data
layers-permission-create-denied: You do not have permission to create layer assets
layers-permission-manage-denied: You do not have permission to manage the layer library
layers-file-write-error: Failed to write layer data to file system
layers-concurrent-edit-detected: Another user has modified this layer set. Please reload and try again.
layers-recovery-mode: Layer editor is in recovery mode due to previous errors
layers-browser-compatibility: Your browser may not support all layer features
layers-error-api: Failed to save changes. Please try again.
layers-error-canvas: Drawing error occurred. Please refresh if issues persist.
layers-error-validation: Invalid data entered. Please check your input.
layers-error-load: Failed to load layer data. Please refresh the page.
layers-error-save: Failed to save layer data. Please try again.
layers-error-render: Rendering error occurred. Please try again.
layers-error-general: An unexpected error occurred. Please refresh if issues persist.
layers-validation-id-type: Layer ID must be a string
layers-validation-id-too-long: Layer ID cannot be longer than $1 characters
layers-validation-fontsize-range: Font size must be between $1 and $2
layers-validation-strokewidth-range: Stroke width must be between $1 and $2
layers-validation-sides-range: Number of sides must be between $1 and $2
layers-validation-blurradius-range: Blur radius must be between $1 and $2
layers-validation-text-type: Text content must be a string
layers-validation-text-too-long: Text content cannot be longer than $1 characters
layers-validation-text-unsafe: Text content contains potentially unsafe content
layers-validation-fontfamily-type: Font family must be a string
layers-validation-fontfamily-too-long: Font family cannot be longer than $1 characters
layers-validation-point-coordinates: Invalid coordinates for point at index $1
layers-validation-point-too-large: Point coordinates too large at index $1
layers-validation-star-points-invalid: Star point count must be a whole number
layers-validation-star-points-range: Star point count must be between $1 and $2
apihelp-layersinfo-summary: Fetch saved layer sets for a file, optionally forcing a specific revision.
apihelp-layersinfo-param-filename: Title or bare filename of the file whose layer data should be returned.
apihelp-layersinfo-param-layersetid: Numeric layer set identifier to load instead of the latest revision.
apihelp-layersinfo-param-limit: Maximum number of layer set revisions to include in all_layersets (defaults to 50, capped at 200).
apihelp-layersinfo-param-offset: Number of revisions to skip before collecting all_layersets (for pagination).
apihelp-layersinfo-param-continue: Continuation token returned from a previous request when more revisions are available.
apihelp-layersinfo-example-1: Get latest layer set for a file: action=layersinfo&filename=Example.jpg
apihelp-layersinfo-example-2: Get a specific layer set by id: action=layersinfo&filename=Example.jpg&layersetid=123
apihelp-layerssave-summary: Save a new layer set revision for a file (requires editlayers right).
apihelp-layerssave-param-filename: Title or bare filename of the file receiving the new layer data.
apihelp-layerssave-param-data: JSON-encoded array of layer objects to persist.
apihelp-layerssave-param-setname: Optional short label shown in the revision picker.
apihelp-layerssave-example-1: Save layers for a file (CSRF token required): action=layerssave&filename=Example.jpg&data=[…]&token=…
